backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profiles and per‑user game level states with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the skip‑button requirement to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend files, including screens, hooks, assets, and level implementations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app with favicon and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating password gate, event selection, gameplay flow, and per‑game progress handling.
frontend/src/components/decor/RomanticDe: Decorative component rendering animated hearts, flowers, and teddies based on a chosen variant.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortraitF: Layout wrapper enforcing portrait view with optional romantic pattern and a Relock button.
Image list and helper selecting per‑level images with game‑specific offsets.
frontend/src/game/assets/winImageMapping: Re‑exports image utilities for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines password, game IDs, total levels, storage keys, and helper for per‑game storage key generation.
frontend/src/game/content/events.ts: Defines the EventContent interface and a list of game and romantic events, plus a helper to fetch events by ID.
frontend/src/game/content/levelHints.ts: Provides short hint strings for levels 1–68, mapped by level number.
frontend/src/game/content/loseMessages.t: Contains randomized lose messages and returns special messages for the Promises 100 game.
frontend/src/game/content/winLetters.ts: Defines win letters per level and integrates Promises 100 win-letter support.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/FixedPuzzl: Implements a configurable puzzle level with many interaction types, timers, drag logic, and auto-win/lose conditions.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level001.t: A level where clicking the instruction wins and clicking the moving heart increments attempts and can cause a loss.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level002.t: A drag-based level where pulling the sun down triggers night mode and wins.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level003.t: A press-and-hold level requiring holding the letter for 1.5 seconds to open and win, with failed attempts leading to loss.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/levelConfi: Defines LevelConfig type and a mapping of level numbers to their instructions, solution keys, and optional data for the default game.
frontend/src/game/levels/levelRegistry.t: Selects the correct level component based on level number and game ID, routing either to default levels or Promises 100 levels.
frontend/src/game/promises100/content/lo: Provides an array of themed lose messages and a helper to return one at random.
frontend/src/game/promises100/content/wi: Contains win-letter text and promises for each Promises 100 level as a numbered record.
frontend/src/game/promises100/levels/lev: Defines Promises100LevelConfig and a full record of instructions, solutions, and optional data for all Promises 100 levels.
frontend/src/game/promises100/levels/Pro: Implements interactive logic for Promises 100 levels, handling taps, holds, drags, waiting, and determining win/lose states.
frontend/src/game/storage/passwordGate.t: Implements password checking and localStorage-based lock/unlock state handling.
frontend/src/game/storage/progressStorag: Manages saving, loading, updating, and resetting player progress using localStorage.
frontend/src/game/storage/useProgress.ts: React hook managing game progress by loading, syncing, and updating level state with local storage and optional backend actor.
frontend/src/game/ui/levelBackground.ts: Generates dynamic per-level background gradients and accent colors based on game ID and level zones.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login flow, and state exposure to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile and game level state via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color themes, dark mode variables, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/EventDetailScreen.t: Displays detailed romantic event content with photo and letter sections, including themed styling and navigation.
frontend/src/screens/EventsHubScreen.tsx: Renders a hub listing all events with styling, icons, and click handling, disabling gameplay events when needed.
frontend/src/screens/IntroScreen.tsx: Empty screen placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays a password entry screen with romantic styling and unlock logic that triggers onSuccess when validated.
frontend/src/screens/LevelPlayScreen.tsx: Loads and renders a level component with themed backgrounds, transition effects, and skip, win, or lose handling.
frontend/src/screens/LoadingScreen.tsx: Shows a timed loading animation with progress bar and triggers onComplete when finished.
frontend/src/screens/LoseScreen.tsx: Renders a themed loss screen with a random message, image, shake animation, and retry button.
Empty screen placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/screens/WinScreen.tsx: Displays a win screen with letter, image fallback system, romantic visuals, and navigation to next level or events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, radii, screens, and loading several plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing implemented features and progress of a 100‑level puzzle game.
